{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Netgear |model=XR450 |revision=
(Nighthawk Pro Gaming) |series=AC2400 |asin=B078GWJ44Z |newegg=N82E16833222002 |price=300 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf=Delta Networks |availability=now |est_release_date=01/08/2018 |fcc_date= |fcc_id=PY315100319 |pcb_id=29764958 |type=wireless router |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=3.5 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Qualcomm |cpu1_model=IPQ8065 |cpu1_cspeed=1.7 GHz |cpu1_cores=2 |fla1=256 |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model=MX30UF2G18AC |ram1=512 |ram1_brand=Nanya |ram1_model=NT5CC128M16IP-DI |ram1_num=2 |expansion_if_types=USB 3.0, |expansion_usb_num=2 |serial=yes,, 4-in header,, J1 |wi1_chip1_brand=Qualcomm Atheros |wi1_chip1_model=QCA9984 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=an+ac |wi1_txchains=4 |wi1_rxchains=4 |wi1_sstreams=4 |wi2_chip1_brand=Qualcomm Atheros |wi2_chip1_model=QCA9984 |wi2_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi2_txchains=4 |wi2_rxchains=4 |wi2_sstreams=4 |eth_cpu=true |sw_brand=Qualcomm Atheros |sw_model=QCA8337 |lan_speed=1GbE |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |flags=Wave2, MU-MIMO, 256QAM, DFS, |stock_os=Linux;;DumaOS; |802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac |default_ip=http://www.routerlogin.net |default_user=admin |default_pass=password }}
:• '''1733''' Mbps - 4SS 5GHz [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/IEEE_802.11ac#Data_rates_and_speed 802.11ac] (80MHz chan.), :• '''600''' Mbps - 4SS 2.4GHz [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/IEEE_802.11n-2009#Data_rates 802.11n] (40MHz chan.) = '''''2400 Mbps'' class'''
{{TagLine|Nighthawk Pro Gaming Router}} :{{ProductPage|https://www.netgear.com/gaming/xr450/}} {{SupportPage|vendor=Netgear|model=XR450}} *[https://kb.netgear.com/000053094/How-do-I-log-in-to-the-router-interface-of-my-XR500-Nighthawk-gaming-router Web GUI]: http://www.routerlogin.net *[https://www.newegg.com/Product/Product.aspx?Item=N82E16833222002 ''Netgear XR450'' on '''Newegg'''] *[https://forum.openwrt.org/t/netgear-r7800-exploration-ipq8065-qca9984/285/987 ''Netgear R7800/XR500'' on '''OpenWrt''' forums] :OEM: [[Delta Networks]] - Board ID: 29764958 (01) :Hardware ID: 29764958+0+256+512+4x4+4x4+Cascade {{See also|Netgear XR500|Netgear XR700|Netgear R7800}} :TurboQAM disabled on 2.4GHz 802.11n radio (600Mbps) :Most of the information on this page was copied from the [[Netgear XR500|XR500]] since the FCC ID is :the same. This router appears to be a feature-limited XR500 [[List of Costco Exclusive Wireless Devices|exclusively for Costco]]. :Changes from the XR500 to this XR450 include the removal of non-standard 256QAM :support for the 2.4GHz radio which reduces the maximum speed from 800Mbps to :600Mbps for 2.4GHz 802.11n. ===See also=== :[[List of Costco Exclusive Wireless Devices]] • [[Netgear]] :[[List of Netgear Nighthawk Products]] • [https://www.netgear.com/gaming/#productBlock Nighthawk Pro Gaming] *[[Netgear XR300]] - ''Nighthawk Pro Gaming XR300 Router'' (AC1750) • [https://www.netgear.com/gaming/xr300/ PPage] *[[Netgear XR450]] - ''Nighthawk Pro Gaming XR450 Router'' (AC2400) • [https://www.netgear.com/gaming/xr450/ PPage] *[[Netgear XR500]] - ''Nighthawk Pro Gaming XR500 Router'' (AC2600) • [https://www.netgear.com/gaming/xr500/ PPage] *[[Netgear XR700]] - ''Nighthawk Pro Gaming XR700 Router'' (AD7200) • [https://www.netgear.com/gaming/xr700/ PPage] *[[Netgear SR10]] - ''Nighthawk Pro Gaming SX10 Switch'' • [https://www.netgear.com/npg/sx10/ PPage] *[[Netgear GS808E]] - ''Nighthawk Gaming S8000 Switch'' • [https://www.netgear.com/landings/s8000/ PPage] __NOTOC__
